title: Sonus Sponsors Enterprise Connect Lync/Skype for Business Tour - Anaheim
text: Sonus Sponsors Enterprise Connect Lync/Skype for Business Tour - Anaheim   Sonus Sponsors Enterprise Connect Lync/Skype for Business Tour - Anaheim -- WESTFORD, Mass.  Sonus Networks, Inc. <-  <- stripped tags -> WESTFORD, Mass.   Key Takeaways: Sonus is a participating sponsor in the Enterprise Connect Lync/Skype for Business Tour in Anaheim, California and throughout the United States . Sonus will be joined by its partner Strategic Products and Services (SPS), a leading Unified Communications System Integrator, managed service provider and Microsoft Gold Communications partner. Brad Chapin , Sonus director of Strategic Alliances will participate in the "Implementing and Managing Lync/Skype for Business" panel. [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWMyOXVkWE11Ym1WMEwyVnVYQ0lnY21Wc1BWd2libTltYjJ4c2IzZGNJaUIwWVhKblpYUTlYQ0pmWW14aGJtdGNJajVUYjI1MWN5Qk9aWFIzYjNKcmN6d3ZZVDQ9fA==]], Inc. (Nasdaq: [[]]), [[]], announced today its participation in the " Enterprise Connect Lync/Skype for Business Tour " at the Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove in Anaheim, California on September 17, 2015 . The tour will focus on the ecosystem that is emerging to support and enhance the migration of Lync to Skype for Business in the enterprise. This event is designed to help enterprises at all levels network with expert vendors and obtain answers to important Skype for Business-related questions including: Which parts of the platform are best for a particular enterprise; How can enterprises make platform elements interwork with legacy communications systems; and How can enterprises protect investments in their current communication networks? "Microsoft's Skype for Business is changing the way companies collaborate and communicate," said Brad Chapin , director, Strategic Alliances, Sonus. "Sonus is focused on helping enterprises embrace this transformative technology by delivering a simple and secure migration from Lync to Skype for Business â€” whether on-premises or in the Office 365 Cloud. We look forward to helping enterprises learn more about Sonus' solutions, while answering key Skype for Business-related questions." View information about Sonus' Microsoft solutions [[]]. Click [[]] for Sonus' Skype for Business for Dummies and Lync Enterprise Voice for Dummies . Other Facts: Sonus is also participating in the [[]] at the Holiday Inn Mart Plaza on September 24 . As a Microsoft Gold Communications Partner, Sonus delivers products and solutions that securely and intelligently enable Microsoft Lync/Skype for Business deployments. Tags/Keywords: Sonus Networks, SONS, Enterprise Connect, Lync/Skype for Business Tour, SPS, Strategic Products and Services About Sonus: Sonus brings the next generation of Cloud-based SIP and 4G/VoLTE solutions to its customers by enabling and securing mission critical traffic for VoIP, video, IM and online collaboration. With Sonus, enterprises can intelligently secure and prioritize real-time communications, while service providers can deliver reliable, secure real-time services for mobile, UC and social applications. Sonus offers an award-winning portfolio of hardware-based and virtualized Session Border Controllers (SBCs), Diameter Signaling Controllers (DSCs), Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) capabilities, Policy/Routing servers and media/signaling gateways. Visit [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWMyOXVkWE11Ym1WMEwxd2lJSEpsYkQxY0ltNXZabTlzYkc5M1hDSWdkR0Z5WjJWMFBWd2lYMkpzWVc1clhDSStkM2QzTG5OdmJuVnpMbTVsZER3dllUND18]] or call 1-855-GO-SONUS.
